commits.content:
Employee Name
Birth Date
Address
Phone
Devisi
Join Date
MasterEmployee::create([ 'name' => $request->input_name, 'join_date' => $request->input_jod, 'birth_date' => $request->input_bod, 'Address' => $request->input_bod, 'birth_date' => $request->input_bod, 'birth_date' => $request->input_bod, 'status' => "on", ]); return response()->json([ 'message' => "Success", 'status' =>200 ]); } public function listemployee(){ if(session("login")){ return view("Modernize.index_list_employee"); } else{ return redirect('/Login'); } } public function daftar_employee(){ $data = MasterEmployee::select('*', DB::raw("DATE_FORMAT(birth_date, '%d %b %Y') as tanggallahir") , DB::raw("DATE_FORMAT(join_date, '%d %b %Y') as tanggaljoin"))->get(); return DataTables::of($data)->make(true); } public function listsalary(){ if(session("login")){ return view("Modernize.index_list_salary_month"); } else{ return redirect('/Login'); } } public function daftar_salary(){ $data = MasterMonth::select('*')->get(); return DataTables::of($data)->make(true); } public function add_month(Request $request){ MasterMonth::create([ 'month' => $request->input_month, 'year' => $request->input_year, 'total_date' => $request->input_totaldate, 'total_salary' => 0, ]); return response()->json([ 'message' => "Success", 'status' =>200 ]); } public function indexdetailsalary(Request $request){ if(session("login")){ $id = $request->id; $list_employee=DB::select('SELECT * FROM master_employee where master_employee.id not in (select detail_month.id_employee from detail_month where detail_month.id_master_month = '.$id.')'); return view("Modernize.detail_list_salary_month", compact("id",'list_employee')); } else{ return redirect('/Login'); } } public function detailsalary(Request $request){ $id_month_salary = $request->id_month; $data = DetailMonth::select('*') ->join('master_employee','master_employee.id','=','detail_month.id_employee') ->where("detail_month.id_master_month", $id_month_salary)->get(); return DataTables::of($data)->make(true); } // public function add_employee(Request $request){ // MasterEmployee::create([ // 'name' => $request->input_name, // 'join_date' => $request->input_jod, // 'birth_date' => $request->input_bod, // 'status' => "on", // ]);
